subject: Kindly get back to me now
body:
Dear Arielle.

Greeting to you and how are you doing today?

I have just received your email dated Sat, Feb 3.

Please this should not be a surprise to you to hear that someone is trying
to claim your funds under the false pretense, that is the truth and dont be
curious or to asked how did he come across this information, this is true
and that is why we contacted you to know if you are aware of it.

However, please with all duo respect, your payment has been approved from
office of the presidency and waiting for signing the release order for your
payment, please to avoid delay and any mistake, we need just your full
names, telephone number,  contact address, any copy of your id now.

Please send all this info very urgent now and let us work together for your
own benefit.

Thank you.
Best Regards
Dr. Usman Wakalia,

subject: Re: Kindly get back to me now
body:
Hello Dr. Usman Wakalia,

I hope this message finds you well. I must say, your email has taken me by surprise! It's not every day that one hears about someone trying to claim their funds under false pretenses.

Could you please provide more details about this situation? How did it come to be that someone is attempting to claim my funds? And how were you able to discover this?

As for the information you requested, I'm afraid I can't provide them at the moment due to privacy concerns. However, I am eager to learn more about this situation and how we can resolve it together.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Arielle

subject: let us work together and you have nothing to regre
